short.zh_CN: 适用于 Chrome 应用程序的 Citrix Receiver
short.zh_TW: Chrome 應用程式的 Citrix Receiver

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Citrix Receiver for Chrome App
The Citrix Receiver app provides a great user experience — a secure, contextual, and unified workspace — on any device. It gives you instant access to all your SaaS and web apps, your  virtual apps, files, and desktops from an easy-to-use, all-in-one interface.
